title: Downhill for fast
text: I have stayed at the Adante 3 or 4 times previously for periods between 1 night and 10 nights, and think I actually wrote a positive review about it a few years ago.I would now sadly have to retract that.I recently spent one night at the Adante, and it was one night too many.The quality of the hotel has gone way down, and upon entering the tiny, steaming hot, 1 bedroom room, with rock hard beds, threadbare sheets and a dripping shower, I was very glad I was only staying one night.Normally my hotel room isn't particularly important as I spend so little time there, but at the same time it's nice to come back to a comfortable room to relax. The Adante no longer offers that, and I won't be staying there again.You can easily find comparatively priced accomodation in downtown San Francisco, and I recommend avoiding the Adante.
